stadiums.name: Anfield
stadiums.description: Anfield Stadium is located in Liverpool, England, and it is home to Liverpool Football Club. As of my last update, its capacity is around 54,074 spectators.

comments.review: Atmosphere was great, the fact that I scored here was also cool.

stadiums.name: Etihad
stadiums.description: The Etihad Stadium is located in Manchester, England, with a capacity of around 53,000 spectators.

stadiums.name: Old Trafford
stadiums.description: Old Trafford, situated in Manchester, England, boasts a capacity of over 74,000 unhappy fans as the iconic home of  the most frustrating team Manchester United.

comments.review: It was fun to play in this stadium.
One of the best experiences I have had.

stadiums.name: Allianz Arena
stadiums.description: Allianz Arena is a football stadium in Munich, Bavaria, Germany, with a 70,000 seating capacity for international matches and 75,000 for domestic matches.

comments.review: The pitch and the atmosphere was amazing!
